content: back loop of each st around 12 st round 4 single_crochet around 12 st round 5 single_crochet around slip_stitch to finish off 12 st antennae make 2 use brown wool round 1 4 single_crochet in a magic_ring 4 st rounds 2 7 single_crochet around 4 st round 8 single_crochet around slip_stitch to finish off 4 st assembly stuff feet and sew two feet to the underside of the first two body segments after the red head segment and the last body segment before the smaller tail segment as shown in the photograph sew eyes to the upper front of the head segment sew antennae to the middle of the top of the head segment with brown wool use straight stitches to sew a small round nose beneath the eyes knot short tufts of yellow wool along the middle of the upper body segments trim to between 1 1 5 cm © 2013 gillian dite
